https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78909 author Nemo157 - area T-rustdoc - merge conflict since november; need review; consider close ?

other than the merge conflicts, this is waiting on review AFAICT. I would hate to close this, it fixes a long-standing rustdoc bug (that was bad enough cargo started warning about it).

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80720 reviewer joshtriplett - area T-doc - doc formatting change. not sure who is the best reviewer here.

I asked Steve Klabnik to review
